name: Moroccan Salad
ingredients: For the dressing: 4 tsp olive oil, 2 tsp vinegar or lemon juice, salt, pepper
steps: Rinse the tomatoes and cucumbers. Peel the red onion. Remove the seeds from the cucumbers. Dice the vegetables.
Place the cucumbers, tomatoes, and red onion in a salad bowl.
Prepare the dressing: mix the vinegar/lemon juice with the salt. Add the olive oil and whisk. Add pepper.
Add the chopped coriander, parsley, and mint to the vegetables and drizzle with the dressing.
Mix gently. Refrigerate for about fifteen minutes before serving.
